html:
8.1.22  7:46 pm   i have been trying to write a novel for 11 months now and i know exactly what i want to write but i keep starting over. any tips?

      you're gonna have to try writing a bad version

8.1.22  6:36 pm   Your music is melted architecture

      fair enough

8.1.22  5:32 pm   so I noticed you have a banjo in some videos/songs? may be a dumb question but I'm extremely curious: do you know how to play rainbow connection and/or do a Kermit the frog impression?

      no

8.1.22  4:13 pm   why do i waste so much time

      maybe you don't like time

8.1.22  2:20 pm   what do you do if you had a good idea, but didnt want to do it?

      write it down

8.1.22  1:50 pm   what's your record on solving a rubik's cube

      never solved it

8.1.22  11:16 am   can you name a language that's also the name of a place?

      not quite

8.1.22  9:48 am   heard you had an ipod. what model? i like ipods

      it was the ipod shuffle, with physical buttons. need the physical buttons or else i'd have to take the thing out of my pocket to see the buttons. i like to keep my hand on it so i can skip tracks at any time, and also manipulate the volume up and down as cars go by, because i want to still hear it good when a car goes by, but it's important that i turn the volume back down after the car passes

8.1.22  8:42 am   Whats your best advice a beginner trying to learn an instrument

      spend some time with the instrument

8.1.22  6:10 am   how do you make friends with someone who wants to be enemies

      don't think very much about the other person

8.1.22  4:55 am   Opinion on being alive?

      unfathomable, unimaginable, unrealistic

8.1.22  3:22 am   Bill, things are just slow lately. The day, it just lasts for such a long time, and nothing ggod or life changing is happening. What hshould I do?

      start thinking more specifically about what you wish would happen

8.1.22  1:15 am   How do you feel about the (unproven but tried and tested) fact that every whole number starting with 6 can be expressed as the sum of three primes? For example, 263 = 3 + 3 + 257.

      any proof of that is probably going to be more statistical in nature. kind of like how if it rains for 6 hours, the sidewalk will have no dry spots

8.1.22  12:33 am   i've not been very productive lately and been wasting my time online and stuff. how to go back to being productive?

      it will help if you know what you would like to produce





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

7.31.22  10:12 pm   Whats the meaning behind sumic?

      it's music

7.31.22  9:00 pm   what does "rs1" mean?

      it seems to be a 4-axle diesel-electric locomotive

7.31.22  8:13 pm   I'm watching TV and I can't tell if I'm watching a crime show or if it's like, a Saturday night live spoof on a crime show

      if it's a spoof, if you're watching regular TV, they're supposed to tell you when you're supposed to laugh

7.31.22  6:06 pm   do you think fish have active imaginations?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

7.31.22  5:16 pm   is there a hidden meaning behind any of your videos?

      yes, it's me. i'm the meaning

7.31.22  4:36 pm   What is a skill you ve always wanted to acquire?

      calming down

7.31.22  2:16 pm   are you real

      i've never been tested

7.31.22  12:42 pm   I'm sick and tired

      i understand

7.31.22  10:35 am   what hobby would you start if you had enough time?

      ESPN, or maybe just ESP

7.31.22  9:26 am   favorite dinosaur?

      every time i have a favorite dinosaur, there's always some scientist around to advise me that that one's actually not technically a dinosaur

7.31.22  7:51 am   which sock should i put on first

      are you telling me you have multiple socks

7.31.22  6:34 am   do you think i could be miss america one day

      sure. maybe even captain of america

7.31.22  4:29 am   Is death bad?

      probably not but i still don't want it

7.31.22  3:20 am   What did you dream about recently?

      math and science

7.31.22  2:15 am   are you vegetarian

      take it a step further. i am an entire vegetable

7.31.22  1:47 am   My sister thinks your music is emo, please help 

      ok, i'll be right over

7.31.22  12:13 am   what was the first time you created and used 3d graphics in a video?

      somewhere around september 2016 i was testing techniques to use for history of the entire world. then i ended up using some of those techniques in history of the entire world

7.30.22  11:32 pm   thoughts on steel soap?

      sounds delicious

7.30.22  10:06 pm   opinion on sandwiches?

      put it between 2 other sandwiches, .... then you've got my attention

7.30.22  10:04 pm   What came first, the chicken or the egg?

      neither one is here yet

7.30.22  8:38 pm   What's your favorite chord progression?

      F C

7.30.22  6:17 pm   Listening to "when i get older" and i need to ask: do your friends still think your a baby?

     fake. didn't happen

     And did you ever get your baby shoes back?

      that whole part of that song is more like a fable

7.30.22  5:53 pm   Are you associated with a religion

      if i were, i'd just wanna switch

7.30.22  3:57 pm   Is there a way to remember everything?

      yes but then it changes

7.30.22  2:39 pm   What's your favourite song? 

      i still haven't found one. that's why i keep making them, just in case

7.30.22  1:50 pm   is it possible to play music live with people online or is lag always too long?

      as of now, this year (2022), using normal phone or chat software, the delay is much too long to play synchronized music together. there might be some specialized software/hardware solutions out there currently which i have not tried. but nonetheless, the latency will come down as the years progress. i'd estimate in 5 to 10 years the problem will be solved, unless the whole situation is upended by much more ridiculous problems

7.30.22  11:29 am   How do you prepare for making a video?

      usually i write the contents. if it has a song, i record and produce the song before doing the video, and before producing the song i have to write the song

7.30.22  10:34 am   how do i write a very very very tiny letter

      just write the letter r. the letter r is fairly small

7.30.22  9:38 am   your newest song is "meet me in september". does this mean you are taking a break from youtube until september?

      no

7.30.22  8:14 am   can i be my own role model?

      occasionally

7.30.22  6:53 am   i've somewhat recently been stomped into the smallest possible version of myself. any suggestions on how to un crumple and restart 

      spend a short while studying other people and how they carry about themselves

7.30.22  5:16 am   at the end of "i can play," you proclaim, "gotta go back to the mall/i forgot a couple of things." is this true?

     no

      did you gotta go back to the mall?

     no

      did you forgot a couple of things?

     no

      did you end up going to the mall?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

7.30.22  3:35 am   when is the best time for you to answer these?

      right now

7.30.22  2:17 am   THOUGHTS ON THE WORD OKAYED

      sounds like O'Cade. how about "approved"

7.30.22  1:14 am   How do you stay grounded

      explain how you got to be where you are. if you follow the story back, you'll find the ground at some point

7.30.22  12:09 am   Did you actually fall in love on the Q train?

      i was.... listening to my ipod. i was falling in love with..... music
